author: bchain99
content: one question, given 2 list of txs, if we take the HashTreeRoot of both lists and they turn out to be identical can we imply that the 2 lists are identical too?

author: bchain99
content: and also are they identical in the sequence? i.e are the sequence of txs identical too?
